w3c.title: World Wide Web Consortium
w3c.description: The international community that develops open standards to ensure the long-term growth of the Web

wot.title: Web of Things
wot.description: The Web of Things (WoT) seeks to counter the fragmentation of the IoT by using and extending existing, standardized Web technologies. By providing standardized metadata and other re-usable technological building blocks, W3C WoT enables easy integration across IoT platforms and application domains
